name: New Colony
description:
New Colony is a weird, short narrative game about an ant who has to start an ant colony.

Features
  • Around 15 minutes of gameplay
  • Be an ant & have fun with your ant friends
  • Drag bread around
  • Summon the Dark Lord


Sokpop makes a new game every two weeks!
Subscribe for 3$ per month at http://sokpop.co
